```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(gapminder)

dataset_results <- read.csv2("primary_results.csv")

dataset_results %>%
  filter(candidate=="Hillary Clinton" | candidate=="Donald Trump")
dataset_results %>%
  filter(party=="Democrat" & county=="Shelby")

dataset_results %>%
  filter(state=="Alabama" & votes>15000)


```

3. function and arrange select

```{r}
new_data <- select(dataset_results,state,county,party,candidate,votes,county)

new_data %>%
  filter(county=="Denton" & state=="Texas")%>%
  arrange(desc(votes))
```

4

```{r}
dataset_results %>%
  filter(candidate=="Ted Cruz" & state=="Alaska") %>%
  mutate(vote_count = as.numeric(votes) / as.numeric(fraction_votes))%>%
  arrange(desc(vote_count))


dataset_results
```
